div.span: Castle Rock School District does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following employee(s) has been designated to handle question and complaints of alleged discrimination: Bryan Keatley, Title IX, Section 504/ADA coordinator, 615 Front Ave SW, Castle Rock, WA 98611, 360.501.2920, rgreene@crschools.org. Ryan Greene, Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator, 600 Huntington Ave S, Castle Rock, WA 98611, 360.501.2940, rgreene@crschools.org.
